## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G18000](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G18000)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>REM20, VDD</u>
- **Gene Name:** VERDANDI
- **Description:**   VERDANDI;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT5G18000.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT5G18000.1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT5G18000.2](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT5G18000.2)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [vdd-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Unfertilized ovules due to synergids that do not degrade which prevents fertilization.
## Literature:
   - [VERDANDI is a direct target of the MADS domain ovule identity complex and affects  embryo sac differentiation in Arabidopsis.](https://www.doi.org/10.1105/tpc.109.068627)&nbsp;&nbsp;DOI:&nbsp;&nbsp;[10.1105/tpc.109.068627](https://www.doi.org/10.1105/tpc.109.068627);&nbsp;&nbsp;PMID:&nbsp;&nbsp;[20581305](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20581305/)
